lines.line: Sometimes, the weight of duty feels like an impossible burden to bear alone.
The battles we face can leave us wounded, both inside and out.
There are moments when the mission seems too daunting, the path ahead unclear.
But remember this: in our darkest hours, we are never truly alone.
When one falls, others rise to carry the burden.
United by purpose, we become an unstoppable force.
Every challenge we face forges us into something stronger.
With determination, we can overcome any obstacle.
This is how legends are made - not in moments of ease, but in times of trial.
Stand tall, stand together, and remember: your greatest victory awaits on the other side of adversity.

parsed_script.full_script: Sometimes, the weight of duty feels like an impossible burden to bear alone. The battles we face can leave us wounded, both inside and out. There are moments when the mission seems too daunting, the path ahead unclear. But remember this: in our darkest hours, we are never truly alone. When one falls, others rise to carry the burden. United by purpose, we become an unstoppable force. Every challenge we face forges us into something stronger. With determination, we can overcome any obstacle. This is how legends are made - not in moments of ease, but in times of trial. Stand tall, stand together, and remember: your greatest victory awaits on the other side of adversity.
